H0.text: Steel is the waste material that will break down most quickly when buried in a landfill.

H1.text: Plastic is the waste material that will break down most quickly when buried in a landfill.

H2.text: Glass will break down most quickly among the waste materials buried in a landfill.

H3.text: Paper is the waste material that will break down most quickly when buried in a landfill.

A4.text: Solid organic material typically decays rapidly as larger organic molecules degrade into smaller molecules.
